query: SELECT id, client_id, status, email_code, auth_code, created_at FROM verification_sessions WHERE client_id = (SELECT id FROM client_login_data WHERE email = 'teste3@example.com' ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 1) ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 1;
